name: Hew Arms
script:
if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then
	ak.twoh.wrist = ak.twoh.wrist + ak.twoh.modifier
	if ak.twoh.wrist > 8 then ak.twoh.wrist = 8 end
	cecho("<yellow>wrist:<cyan> "..ak.twoh.wrist)
	ak.wristHit()
end
matches: ^The sickening crunch of bone can be heard as the blade smashes into the ([\w'\-]+) arm of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^The wet crunch of bone can be heard as the hammer smashes into the (right|left) arm of ([\w'\-]+).$
